price: Ɛda a asaase no bεwaewae afri wͻn ho no, wͻde ntεmpε (na εbepue akͻ faako a yεrekͻbu wͻn atεn no). Saa (awufoͻ no) anoboa no yε adeε a εyε mmrε ma Yεn.
arabic: يَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ عَنۡهُمۡ سِرَاعٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشۡرٌ عَلَيۡنَا يَسِيرٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yawma tashaqqaqu al-arḍu ʿanhum sirāʿan dhālika ḥashrun ʿalaynā yasīrun
